Package mms.personal

Class Clothes

Object
Personal
Clothes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Packable
public class Clothes extends Personal
Clothes owner by someone.
Clothes come in many types and sizes.
Implement this for Assignment 1

  • Constructor Details

    • Clothes

      public Clothes(String owner, Size size, ClotheType type)
      Creates clothes with a particular owner, size and type.
      Clothing has the following dimensions determined by their size.
      Clothing size in cm
      Clothing Size width in cm height in cm length in cm
      SMALL 40 65 10
      MEDIUM 50 70 10
      LARGE 55 75 10
      Parameters:
      owner - owner of this clothing
      size - size of this clothing
      type - type of this clothing
      Implement this for Assignment 1

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the human-readable string representation of the clothing.

      The format of the string to return is: 

       Clothes ('owner') ('size', 'type')
      • 'owner' is this clothing's owner.
      • 'size' is this clothing's size.
      • 'type' is this clothing's type.

      For example: 

       Clothes (Bob) (SMALL, SHIRT)
      Overrides:
      toString in class Personal
      Returns:
      string representation of this clothing
      Implement this for Assignment 1
